name: aptos-ts-sdk
description: Aptos TypeScript SDK guide for building dApps, managing accounts, and interacting with the Aptos blockchain

features.installation: npm, yarn, pnpm, bun, browser setup
features.account_management: Generate, derive, and manage accounts (Ed25519, Secp256k1, HD)
features.transactions: Build, simulate, sign, and submit transactions
features.reading_data: Query account info, modules, tokens, and resources
features.nfts: Create collections, mint, transfer, and burn NFTs
features.sponsored_transactions: Fee payer transactions for gasless user experience
features.keyless_accounts: OAuth/social login accounts (Google, Apple) without private keys
features.advanced: Multi-agent transactions, error handling, batch operations
